analysis.name: UC-Maps
analysis.description: A mobile application designed to map the University of Cincinnati campus.
achievements: Developed a cross-platform mobile application supporting Android, iOS, web, and desktop leveraging Flutter framework.
Implemented location-based features, providing users with campus navigation capabilities.
Successfully structured the project for future scalability and maintainability with adherence to established best practices.
key_features: Utilized a cross-platform framework enabling a single codebase to target multiple operating systems.
Incorporated user interface designs for easy navigation and intuitive use.
Enabled future integration of the maps with other services such as scheduling or resource location.
